titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel LADY HELEN.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1540)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4422.

bill.summary: 7/22/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.
